ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: why then, if you are not subject to Our command,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then why, if you are not indebted (to Us for life),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: if you are not subject to anyone's authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If you are true to your claim that there is no Day of Judgment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So why is it not, that if you are not to be repaid, –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then why do you not -- if you are not Madinin
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then why is it not-- if you are not held under authority--
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: why, if you are not at Our disposal,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Why then, if ye are not in bondage (unto Us),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: why, then, if you are not subject to Our command,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore then, if ye are not to be requited
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then why do you not restore it, if you are not subject
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then why do ye not,- If you are exempt from (future) account,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then why do you not, if you are exempt from the reckoning and recompense (punishment, etc.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: why then, if you are not revived,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If you are not held to account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:86] why then, if you are not going to face a reckoning, [if] you are [not] going to be requited by your being resurrected, in other words, [why then, if] you are not going to be resurrected as you claim,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Why then, if ye are not in bondage (unto Us)) if you are not legally bound, rewarded or taken to task,
